combatMoves.name: Shadow Strike
combatMoves.description: A lightning-fast attack from the shadows

combatMoves.name: Maximum Stretch Strike
combatMoves.description: Dr. Mittens extends his body to impossible lengths, delivering a whip-like strike that can reach enemies far beyond normal range and knock them back

combatMoves.name: Semicircle Shield
combatMoves.description: Bends into a perfect semicircle formation, creating a protective barrier that deflects projectiles and absorbs incoming damage while maintaining mobility

environmentalPowers.name: Rescue Stretch
environmentalPowers.description: Can extend body through tight spaces, around corners, and under doors to reach trapped allies and guide them to safety, regardless of distance or obstacles

environmentalPowers.name: Contortion Crawl
environmentalPowers.description: Bends and twists through impossibly small openings, vents, and passages that would be inaccessible to normal-sized creatures, allowing stealth infiltration

socialSkills.name: Thunderous Purr
socialSkills.description: Produces an incredibly loud, rumbling purr that can be heard across entire areas, instantly drawing attention and compelling others to provide treats or assistance

socialSkills.name: Heroic Reputation
socialSkills.description: His history of rescue missions makes other pets and NPCs more likely to trust him and share information about those in need of help

passiveTraits.name: Infinite Flexibility
passiveTraits.description: Supernatural bendiness allows Dr. Mittens to contort away from attacks and fit through spaces 75% smaller than his normal body size

passiveTraits.name: Brother's Bond
passiveTraits.description: Can sense when any ally is in distress or trapped within a 100-meter radius, with directional awareness and urgency level indicators

weakness.name: Hygiene Paralysis
weakness.description: Encounters with dirty, smelly, or unsanitary environments cause Dr. Mittens to become overwhelmed and lose 50% of all stats. Cannot use stretching abilities when contaminated until thoroughly cleaned.

timeModifiers.name: During Rescue Missions
timeModifiers.effect: All abilities gain +15% success rate and stretching distance increases by 25%

combatMoves.name: Tail Inflation
combatMoves.description: Signature defensive move that inflates tail to maximum size

combatMoves.name: Growl Warning
combatMoves.description: Low-frequency threat display that affects all nearby targets

environmentalPowers.name: Blanket Fort Mastery
environmentalPowers.description: Complete dominance of under-cover zones and bedding areas

environmentalPowers.name: Silent Stealth Protocol
environmentalPowers.description: Predators cannot detect waste regardless of concealment effort

socialSkills.name: Gradual Bond Formation
socialSkills.stats: Trust Building • High Loyalty • Slow Activation
socialSkills.description: Takes time to warm up but forms deep, lasting connections

socialSkills.name: Guardian Protocol
socialSkills.description: Automatically intervenes to rescue or defend allies when needed

passiveTraits.name: Contemplative Focus
passiveTraits.description: Maintains calm and clear thinking in stressful situations like vet visits

passiveTraits.name: Muppet Face Advantage
passiveTraits.stats: Charm Bonus • Visual Effect • Always Active
passiveTraits.description: Natural endearing appearance provides social advantages

weakness.name: AC Startle Response
weakness.description: Sudden air conditioning activation causes -30 to all stats for 10 seconds
